channel.title: Comments for page "Weighted Dustcloak"
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Weighted Dustcloak"

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded:
alright, so it IS distill-able… do you know what it distills into? because the page does not say.

Also, the items page list this as -3 levels, but this page says -2, which is correct?

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: Do wasteland dustcloack. Then at higher season u can distill, use rune and a bit of stuff and get the best cloack for trophy ^_^

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: personally i didn't even bother with this, i just went with wasteland cloak then dustcloak of sneaking. though i had StI before hand so no stamina loss either way.

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: There is a warning not to craft this item since its penalty doesn't go away when you craft a higher end cloak… isn't it possible to simple distill this item (like you can the other cloaks) when you acquire a higher level cloak?

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: Just a note to those completists… while the Stamina cost cut does not stack with the other cloaks, the -2 levels *still* takes effect.
